frontmatter.title: Two Facts i Wish i Knew When i Was Diagnosed With Thyroid Cancer.
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: His response chilled me: “Because I can’t look at your lungs with a sonogram.”
frontmatter.hero_alt: Two Facts i Wish i Knew When i Was Diagnosed With Thyroid Cancer.

frontmatter.title: Revile Mediocrity
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Saturday night, 12:30 a.m. I'm standing in front of a '15 Dodge Challenger Hellcat. The dealership is closed. I stopped by on my way home from the office, I'm alone with my thoughts.
